    • Uses of PixelData in edu.stanford.cfuller.imageanalysistools.image

      Subclasses of PixelData in edu.stanford.cfuller.imageanalysistools.image 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BasicPixelData
      Holds image pixel data in a type-independent manner; handles conversion to the appropriate number format for the data being stored to disk.
      class  ImagePlusPixelData
      A type of WritablePixelData that uses an ImageJ ImagePlus as its underlying representation.
      class  ImgLibPixelData
      A type of WritablePixelData that uses an ImgLib2 ImgPlus as its underlying representation.
      class  WritablePixelData
      An extension of a PixelData object that also supports writing of image data.
